name: City Block
uniques: Turn this tile into a [Developed City] tile

name: Spend Wood
uniques: Costs [4] [Wood] <if [Universal Exchange] is not constructed> <if [Wood Exchange] is not constructed>
Costs [3] [Wood] <if [Universal Exchange] is constructed> <if [Wood Exchange] is not constructed>

name: Spend Wheat
uniques: Costs [4] [Wheat] <if [Universal Exchange] is not constructed> <if [Wheat Exchange] is not constructed>
Costs [3] [Wheat] <if [Universal Exchange] is constructed> <if [Wheat Exchange] is not constructed>

name: Spend Bricks
uniques: Costs [4] [Bricks] <if [Universal Exchange] is not constructed> <if [Bricks Exchange] is not constructed>
Costs [3] [Bricks] <if [Universal Exchange] is constructed> <if [Bricks Exchange] is not constructed>

name: Spend Sheep
uniques: Costs [4] [Sheep] <if [Universal Exchange] is not constructed> <if [Sheep Exchange] is not constructed>
Costs [3] [Sheep] <if [Universal Exchange] is constructed> <if [Sheep Exchange] is not constructed>

name: Spend Ore
uniques: Costs [4] [Ore] <if [Universal Exchange] is not constructed> <if [Ore Exchange] is not constructed>
Costs [3] [Ore] <if [Universal Exchange] is constructed> <if [Ore Exchange] is not constructed>

name: Harbor
uniques: Automatically built in all cities where it is buildable

name: Wood Exchange
uniques: Only available <in cities with a [Harbor]> <in cities without a [Exchange]>

name: Wheat Exchange
uniques: Only available <in cities with a [Harbor]> <in cities without a [Exchange]>

name: Sheep Exchange
uniques: Only available <in cities with a [Harbor]> <in cities without a [Exchange]>

name: Ore Exchange
uniques: Only available <in cities with a [Harbor]> <in cities without a [Exchange]>

name: Universal Exchange
uniques: Only available <in cities with a [Harbor]> <in cities without a [Exchange]>

name: Bricks Exchange
uniques: Only available <in cities with a [Harbor]> <in cities without a [Exchange]>

name: Longest Road
uniques: Only available <when number of [Owned [All Road] Tiles] is more than [6]> <when number of [[in all cities connected to capital] Cities] is more than [1]>
Automatically built in all cities where it is buildable
Triggers a global alert upon completion

name: Largest Army
uniques: Only available <when number of [[Soldier] Units] is more than [4]>
Automatically built in all cities where it is buildable
Triggers a global alert upon completion
